channel.title: !Looking for help (PROGRAMMING WISE)!
channel.description:
I am trying to change stuff on my server. If im going to change something on the server do I have to compile after or something to get the things to work afterword?
And Im looking for a few more things.
Im looking to learn how to...
1. Remove objects. 2. Add things. 3. Create new zones (already existant ones) Like admin/mod/owner zones.
I also want to know how to...
- Make a portal to Castle Wars. So people can like play CW on my server.
- Make the Fight Caves minigame in my server. With jad as the boss and ect.
- Change what shops sell/prices of items.
- Change the amount of Xp you get when training on like the prayer alter and statue and ect.
I think thats it.. Lol...
Call me a noob programmer all you want. I won't consider it spam. I know I am a noob. But Help me please? That't what this forum is for isn't it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 10:40:00 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help me here?

item.title: !Looking for help (PROGRAMMING WISE)!
item.dc:creator: @Kyle11594 Kyle11594
item.description:
@Kyle11594 wrote:

I am trying to change stuff on my server. If im going to change something on the server do I have to compile after or something to get the things to work afterword?

And Im looking for a few more things.

Im looking to learn how to…

  1. Remove objects.
  2. Add things.
  3. Create new zones (already existant ones) Like admin/mod/owner zones.

I also want to know how to…

  • Make a portal to Castle Wars. So people can like play CW on my server.

  • Make the Fight Caves minigame in my server. With jad as the boss and ect.

  • Change what shops sell/prices of items.

  • Change the amount of Xp you get when training on like the prayer alter and statue and ect.

I think thats it… Lol…

Call me a noob programmer all you want. I won’t consider it spam. I know I am a noob. But Help me please? That’t what this forum is for isn’t it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 10:40:00 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help me here?
